title: Amazon's best Prime Day Apple deals have just been extended
description: Prime Big Deal Days has turned into Prime Week, with the extension of some of the most popular Apple markdowns — ranging from the Apple Watch SE 2 for $169 to the $374.99 iPad mini and $749 MacBook Air.Prime Day deals on Apple have been extended. [Apple/AppleInsider]Amazon's popular October Prime Day featured some highly aggressive sales on Apple products — and we've rounded up the best deals that are still going strong. Continue Reading on AppleInsider
author: Christine McKee
excerpt: Prime Big Deal Days has turned into Prime Week, with the extension of some of the most popular Apple markdowns — ranging from the Apple Watch SE 2 for $169 to the $374.99 iPad mini and $749 MacBook Air.
text: Prime Day deals on Apple have been extended. [Apple/AppleInsider] Prime Big Deal Days has turned into Prime Week, with the extension of some of the most popular Apple markdowns — ranging from the Apple Watch SE 2 for $169 to the $374.99 iPad mini and $749 MacBook Air. Amazon's popular October Prime Day featured some highly aggressive sales on Apple products — and we've rounded up the best deals that are still going strong. Apple Watch Amazon's popular Apple Watch deals are still available. Amazon's $169 Apple Watch SE 2 deal has been extended, providing a budget-friendly wearable that makes an excellent gift. SE 2 GPS with 40mm Aluminum Case (select colors): $169.99 ($80 off) SE 2 GPS + Cellular with 44mm Aluminum Case (select colors): $249.99 ($70 off) Series 10 GPS with 42mm Aluminum Case (select colors): $375.99 ($24 off) Ultra 2 with new Black Titanium Case (select bands): $734.89 ($60 off) View even more of the best Apple Watch prices... AirPods & Beats AirPods Max are still at record low prices after Prime Day. AirPods Max can still be picked up for as low as $394.95 after the Prime Big Deal Days event. Amazon continues to offer the $349.99 iPad mini 6 deal that made headlines during the October Prime Day event — and the Apple reseller has even issued better-than-Prime Day pricing on the Apple Pencil Pro and Apple Pencil 2. iPad 9th Generation (64GB, Wi-Fi): $199.99 ($130 off) iPad 10th Generation (64GB, Wi-Fi): $299 ($50 off) iPad mini (64GB, Wi-Fi): $349.99 ($150 off) with Prime M2 iPad Air 6 (64GB, Wi-Fi): $549 ($50 off) M4 iPad Pro 13-inch (1TB, Wi-Fi, Nano-Texture Glass) Space Black: $1,999 ($200 off) M4 iPad Pro 13-inch (2TB, Standard Glass): $2,099 ($200 off) Compare iPad prices across the range... html:
Prime Day deals on Apple have been extended. [Apple/AppleInsider]

Prime Big Deal Days has turned into Prime Week, with the extension of some of the most popular Apple markdowns — ranging from the Apple Watch SE 2 for $169 to the $374.99 iPad mini and $749 MacBook Air.

Amazon's popular October Prime Day featured some highly aggressive sales on Apple products — and we've rounded up the best deals that are still going strong.

Apple Watch

Amazon's popular Apple Watch deals are still available.

Amazon's $169 Apple Watch SE 2 deal has been extended, providing a budget-friendly wearable that makes an excellent gift.

  • SE 2 GPS with 40mm Aluminum Case (select colors): $169.99 ($80 off)
  • SE 2 GPS + Cellular with 44mm Aluminum Case (select colors): $249.99 ($70 off)
  • Series 10 GPS with 42mm Aluminum Case (select colors): $375.99 ($24 off)
  • Ultra 2 with new Black Titanium Case (select bands): $734.89 ($60 off)
    • View even more of the best Apple Watch prices...

AirPods & Beats

AirPods Max are still at record low prices after Prime Day.

AirPods Max can still be picked up for as low as $394.95 after the Prime Big Deal Days event.

  • AirPods 4: $119 ($10 off)

  • AirPods 3 with Lightning Charging Case: $129.99 ($40 off)

  • AirPods Max Over-Ear Headphones with Lightning Charging: $394.95 ($105 off)

  • AirPods Max Over-Ear Headphones with USB-C Charging: $498.99 ($51 off)

    • Beats

    • Beats Solo Buds: $49.99 ($30 off)
    • Beats Studio Pro Wireless Over-Ear Headphones: $169.99 ($180 off)
    • Beats Studio Pro x Kim Kardashian Over-ear Headphones: $189.99 ($160 off)
    • Beats Studio Buds: $79.99 ($70 off)
    • Beats Solo 4 Wireless On-Ear Headphones: $99.99 ($100 off)

    HomePod

    • HomePod 2nd Generation: $279 ($20 off)
    • HomePod mini in select colors: $94.99 ($5 off)

    iPad

    iPad deals start at just $199 post-Prime Big Deal Days.

    Amazon continues to offer the $349.99 iPad mini 6 deal that made headlines during the October Prime Day event — and the Apple reseller has even issued better-than-Prime Day pricing on the Apple Pencil Pro and Apple Pencil 2.

    • iPad 9th Generation (64GB, Wi-Fi): $199.99 ($130 off)
    • iPad 10th Generation (64GB, Wi-Fi): $299 ($50 off)
    • iPad mini (64GB, Wi-Fi): $349.99 ($150 off) with Prime
    • M2 iPad Air 6 (64GB, Wi-Fi): $549 ($50 off)
    • M4 iPad Pro 13-inch (1TB, Wi-Fi, Nano-Texture Glass) Space Black: $1,999 ($200 off)
    • M4 iPad Pro 13-inch (2TB, Standard Glass): $2,099 ($200 off)
      • Compare iPad prices across the range...

    Apple Pencil

    • Apple Pencil Pro: $96 ($33 off)
    • Apple Pencil 2: $79 ($50 off)

    AirTag

    Discounted AirTag prices start at just $24.99.

    AirTag deals are a popular option, with holiday travel on the horizon. Save up to $20 at Amazon.

    • AirTag: $24.99 ($5 off)
    • AirTag 4-pack: $79.98 ($20 off)

    Mac computers

    MacBook Air and MacBook Pro sales are still in effect.

    13-inch MacBook Air

    • M2 13" Air (8-core GPU, 8GB RAM, 256GB SSD): $749 ($250 off)
      • Find plenty of additional markdowns in our M3 13-inch MacBook Air Price Guide...

    14-inch MacBook Pro

    • M3 14" MBP (8-core CPU, 10-core GPU, 8GB RAM, 512GB SSD) Silver: $1,299 ($300 off)
    • M3 Pro 14" MBP (11-core CPU, 14-core GPU, 18GB RAM, 512B SSD) Space Black: $1,699 ($300 off)
      • Grab dozens of additional deals in our Mac Price Guide...

    Mac mini

    • M2 Mac mini (8-core CPU, 10-core GPU), 8GB, 256GB: $499.99 ($100 off) with on-page coupon
      • Compare Mac mini prices on every model...
